altername_name: Fushigi no Dungeon: Fuurai no Shiren GB 2: Sabaku no Majou
风来的西林2 沙漠魔城
name: Fushigi no Dungeon: Furai no Shiren GB2: Sabaku no Majou
overview: Fushigi no Dungeon: Furai no Shiren GB2: Sabaku no Majou is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by ChunSoft, which was released in Japan in 2001.
